title: The Atlantic community: introducing the United Kingdom
creator_contributor_role: North Atlantic Treaty Organization, production company

description: A survey of the United Kingdom as a major member of NATO, showing her expanding industries, her military strength, her highly mechanised agriculture, and her progressive social legislation; and sitting side by side with these the unchanging beauty of her countryside and her love of the best in her past history and traditions.
